definition: to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: In governance, the chief must consult with the Council on all important matters.
sentences.chinese: 酋长在管理上的重大问题上必须与议会磋商。

sentences.english: Indian and Russian officials say the two prime ministers held wide-ranging discussions.
sentences.chinese: 印度和俄罗斯官员说，两国总理就议题了磋商。

sentences.english: A basis for COC consultations is the implementation of the DOC.
sentences.chinese: “准则”磋商是建立在落实《宣言》基础上的。

sentences.english: The Chairman said he would continue with his informal consultations on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 主席称自己会继续就这个问题开展非正式的磋商。

sentences.english: Japan-US consultations will refer South Korea to develop a "5029" program.
sentences.chinese: 日美磋商将参考美韩制定的“5029”计划。

sentences.english: We are working with them to reschedule, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在磋商重新安排会议”，他说。

sentences.english: China takes US to WTO over tire tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 中国要求美国就轮胎特保案启动WTO磋商。
宝莉是个能干的磋商者。

sentences.english: Chinese Ambassador to the United States Zhang Yesui attended the above consultations and meetings.
sentences.chinese: 中国驻美大使张业遂参加了上述磋商和会见。

sentences.english: Chinese and South Korean diplomatic authorities have held many rounds of negotiations on the handling of the issue.
sentences.chinese: 中韩双方外交部门就如何解决此问题进行了多轮磋商。

sentences.english: And the delegation will try to reunite the venders with their seized merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 代表团将竭力磋商，争取让商人们领回被收缴的货物。

sentences.english: Caucus is a form of discussion in formal debate, in which delegates may discuss a subtopic more specifically.
sentences.chinese: 磋商是正式辩论过程中一种深入讨论议题的方式。

sentences.english: Tierney was not involved in negotiating the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 不过他并没有参与该协议的磋商。

sentences.english: A series of regional consultations preceeded the third session.
sentences.chinese: 在第三次会议召开之前举行了一系列区域磋商。

sentences.english: However,could you help us to negotiate a better rent with the landlord?
sentences.chinese: 但是，你可以替我们与业主磋商一个合理的租金吗？

sentences.english: We genuinely want to engage in consultation.
sentences.chinese: 我们真心实意希望进行磋商。

definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to agree/to decide after consultation/to come to a compromise
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
